name: Trick or Treat - DEMO
description:
A beatable, but semi-difficult demo for the longer Halloween-themed JRPG-lite game "Trick Or Treat"
Current plans are to release additional areas on a weekly basis until the full game is available just around Halloween! 

Controls
Arrow Keys = Movement
WASD Keys = Movement
Enter Key = Interact/Select
Escape Key = Menu

Features
JRPG Turn-Based Combat
Undead Cat party member
Lots of Zombies, Crows, Specters, and even a Cryptkeeper!
